languages.text: "Я так жаждала увидеть горы богатств, что позабыла — настоящим сокровищем всегда были и остаетесь вы, шерин!" {n}Джай принимает позу поудобнее, намереваясь как следует насладиться процессом "описи".{/n}

"I had become so obsessed with the prospect of seeing mountains of treasure, I forgot you were the real treasure all along, shereen!" {n}Jae makes herself comfortable, intending to fully enjoy the "inventory-taking."{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я так жаждала увидеть горы богатств, что позабыла — настоящим сокровищем всегда были и остаетесь вы, шерин!" {n}Джай принимает позу поудобнее, намереваясь как следует насладиться процессом "описи".{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I had become so obsessed with the prospect of mountains of treasure, I forgot you were the real treasure all along, shereen!" {n}Jae makes herself comfortable, intending to fully enjoy the "inventory-taking".{/n}

"I had become so obsessed with the prospect of seeing mountains of treasure, I forgot you were the real treasure all along, shereen!" {n}Jae makes herself comfortable, intending to fully enjoy the "inventory-taking."{/n}

"I had become so obsessed with the prospect of seeing mountains of treasure, I forgot you were the real treasure all along, shereen!" {n}Jae makes herself comfortable, intending to fully enjoy the "inventory-taking."{/n}

languages.text: «¡Me había obsesionado tanto con la idea de ver montañas de tesoros que había olvidado que usted era el mayor de todos ellos, shereen!». {n}Jae se pone cómoda, con toda la intención de disfrutar de este «inventario».{/n}
languages.original_text: "I had become so obsessed with the prospect of seeing mountains of treasure, I forgot you were the real treasure all along, shereen!" {n}Jae makes herself comfortable, intending to fully enjoy the "inventory-taking."{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Me había obsesionado tanto con la idea de ver montañas de tesoros que había olvidado que usted era el mayor de todos ellos, shereen!». {n}Jae se pone cómoda, con toda la intención de disfrutar de este «inventario».{/n}

languages.text: “那些堆积如山的宝藏让我看花了眼，我差点忘了你才是真正的宝藏，亲爱的！”{n}婕伊摆了个舒适的姿势，打算充分享受这个“清点数据”的过程。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I had become so obsessed with the prospect of seeing mountains of treasure, I forgot you were the real treasure all along, shereen!" {n}Jae makes herself comfortable, intending to fully enjoy the "inventory-taking."{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那些堆积如山的宝藏让我看花了眼，我差点忘了你才是真正的宝藏，亲爱的！”{n}婕伊摆了个舒适的姿势，打算充分享受这个“清点数据”的过程。{/n}

languages.text: 「あたしは宝の山を見るという夢に執着してきたけど、あなたが本当の宝だったということを忘れてたわ、シェリーン！」{n}ジェイはくつろいで、「インベントリの記録」を楽しもうとする。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I had become so obsessed with the prospect of seeing mountains of treasure, I forgot you were the real treasure all along, shereen!" {n}Jae makes herself comfortable, intending to fully enjoy the "inventory-taking."{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あたしは宝の山を見るという夢に執着してきたけど、あなたが本当の宝だったということを忘れてたわ、シェリーン！」{n}ジェイはくつろいで、「インベントリの記録」を楽しもうとする。{/n}

languages.text: « J'étais si obnubilée par la perspective de contempler des montagnes de trésors que j'en aurais presque oublié que c'est vous, le plus précieux des trésors, shereen ! » {n}Jae se met à l'aise, bien décidée à profiter pleinement du spectacle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I had become so obsessed with the prospect of seeing mountains of treasure, I forgot you were the real treasure all along, shereen!" {n}Jae makes herself comfortable, intending to fully enjoy the "inventory-taking."{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'étais si obnubilée par la perspective de contempler des montagnes de trésors que j'en aurais presque oublié que c'est vous, le plus précieux des trésors, shereen ! » {n}Jae se met à l'aise, bien décidée à profiter pleinement du spectacle.{/n}

languages.text: "Dağlar kadar hazine görme ihtimaline o kadar takılmışım ki bunca zamandır asıl hazinenin sen olduğunu unutmuşum şirinim!" {n}Jae, "envanter sayımının" keyfini çıkarmak üzere rahatça yerleşiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I had become so obsessed with the prospect of seeing mountains of treasure, I forgot you were the real treasure all along, shereen!" {n}Jae makes herself comfortable, intending to fully enjoy the "inventory-taking."{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dağlar kadar hazine görme ihtimaline o kadar takılmışım ki bunca zamandır asıl hazinenin sen olduğunu unutmuşum şirinim!" {n}Jae, "envanter sayımının" keyfini çıkarmak üzere rahatça yerleşiyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich war so sehr davon besessen, Berge von Schätzen zu sehen, dass ich vergaß, dass Ihr der eigentliche Schatz seid, Shereen!" {n}Jae macht es sich bequem, um die 'Inventur' in vollen Zügen zu genießen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I had become so obsessed with the prospect of seeing mountains of treasure, I forgot you were the real treasure all along, shereen!" {n}Jae makes herself comfortable, intending to fully enjoy the "inventory-taking."{/n}
